original_text: Carr死于肺癌并发症，活动后的晚上九点多倒在了新闻编辑室里。他曾在其作品“The Night of the Gun”结尾写到：“I now inhabit a life I don’t deserve, ...but we all walk this earth feeling we are frauds. The trick is to be grateful and hope the caper doesn’t end any time soon.”[蜡烛]
text: Carr死于肺癌并发症，活动后的晚上九点多倒在了新闻编辑室里。他曾在其作品“The Night of the Gun”结尾写到：“I now inhabit a life I don’t deserve, ...but we all walk this earth feeling we are frauds. The trick is to be grateful and hope the caper doesn’t end any time soon.”[蜡烛]
user_description: 全球深度报道网是GIJN在中国的官方网站。GIJN (Global Investigative Journalism Network)是一间扶持、生产深度报道并促进其发展的非盈利性国际机构。
